name: Skeletal Alchemist
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The skeletal alchemist has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeletal alchemist makes two Lob Acid attacks.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. 4 (1d6 + 1 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lob Acid
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1 damage) acid damage.
